
h1. Show Messages


Sometimes you may want to show messages in specific intervals, eXo Chat will help you to do this with simple steps .



!ConversationWindow.png!



Select a time interval in the default time intervals next to the *Show messages from:* label:


|| Name || Description ||
| Today  | To show all messages of the current date. |
| This week | To show all messages of the current week. |
| Last 30 days | To show all messages from last 30 days to the current date. |
| Begin  | To show all messages from the beginning in this room to the current date. |


All messages created within the time and date that you chose will be shown in the *Conversation* window.
